lenders.name: Evan & Anna
lenders.loan_because: We firmly believe that everyone should be able to have a cold drink after a hard day's work.
lenders.occupational_info: Evan is a teacher and Anna is an infrastructure planning engineer.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: It feels great!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a wanna be sailor and world traveler.

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I care about people everywhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers. I am in school part-time studying to become a minister.

lenders.name: Shawn & Janamarie
lenders.loan_because: A great organizational behavior class taught by Warner Woodworth (http://marriottschool.byu.edu/emp/WPW) at BYU in the late 90s educated me about the power of things such as micro loans.  My wife and I have been greatly blessed, and we hope our participation will make a meaningful difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer programs, such as Internet applications.  My wife manages our 3 boys at home and does accounting part time on the side.

lenders.name: Sasha
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone working to better themselves and their families -and love that Kiva allows me to help someone change the course of their lives.

lenders.name: Beatriz
lenders.loan_because: I am a female entrepreneur running a small company which is now 20 years old.  In all that time, I have had difficulty getting financing, and have had to fund my company myself.  I have had a bit of success, and now want to lend a helping hand to other female entrepreneurs who just need a small financial push to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small advertising agency.

lenders.name: Sabra
lenders.loan_because: I have always been a little in awe of anyone who has the skill and courage to be an entrepreneur.  Kiva allowed me to choose the businesses that would receive my support and  I often find myself thinking of "my" people as if they were friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time in a shelter for homeless families.  My job is to supervise house routines and to offer information and support to residents.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because:
I've heard a proverb that is attributed to Russia that goes something like this:  "If you aren't a liberal when you are young, you have no heart.  If you aren't a conservative when you're older, you have no brain."  
Being in my middle years I see this  tranformational shift within me.

The proverb informs why I lend because slowly, over many years, I've realized that on occasion my generosity may have actually worked to entrench a problem rather than solve it.  Since then, I've been much more focused on organizations that seek to empower individuals to *solve* problems and not merely band-aid them.  This seems like one of these.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because:
... I am "able". (Albeit modest in amount.)
What is your reason for sharing?
lenders.occupational_info: "Special Needs" Advocate

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel connected to people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing consultant.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the same opportunities to succeed.

lenders.name: Elton & Frances
lenders.loan_because: Working to benefit society maximizes individual happiness. Progressive cultures have worked to free humanity from the brutalities of mere survival and to reduce suffering, improve society, and develop global community. We seek to minimize the inequities of circumstance and ability, and we support a just distribution of nature’s resources and the fruits of human effort so that as many as possible can enjoy THE GOOD LIFE!
lenders.occupational_info: We are avid motorcyclists and supporters of motorcyclists; We are also both Registered Nurses in hospitals.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because:
Jesus said to feed the poor and give shelter, so I am trying to do what my Lord commands.  

Jesus also said: when you feed the poor and give them shelter, you are feeding and sheltering me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been installing and fixing electrical items

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: It is important (to me) to take personal responsibility for my involvement and contribution to the well-being of the world.

lenders.name: Ed Bortoni
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: Most people are honest and want a chance to succeed in life.  I hope my small loans make a big difference to people who are less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell party goods and chocolates on the internet.  I am also an amateur photographer.  http://instacanv.as/islandbirdnerd

lenders.name: Cris, Ian and kids
lenders.loan_because: We want to empower them to succeed, thereby changing their own lives and their childrens lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office for government, and my husband is an electrician

lenders.name: Ruth M.
lenders.loan_because: My family was able to help me along financially when I needed it, and I want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a one-woman home repair and maintence service.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It\'s needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I a geographer who works with biking, transit, walking in cities.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I study animals and I teach at a University.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes is a little help to move someone else forward in life.

lenders.name: Matthew M Arsh
lenders.loan_because: helping people is important
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: A.C.
lenders.loan_because: everyone in one form or another, small or large, has the ability and means to help someone.

lenders.name: Cissy
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs help one way or another to alleviate their suffering.  Most people in impoverished and developing countries live in daily struggles that we, in developed countries, can't even imagine.  This is a way that I could help them towards a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make buildings and also design interiors worldwide.

lenders.name: Clincomedic
lenders.loan_because: it takes alot to ask for help and these folks ask for our help to make better lives for them and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Emergency medical care of sick and injured people.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help those who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: For 33 years I gave medical care to sick children

lenders.name: Omar Suave
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info:
I attend school every day except Sat. and Sun.
I study a lot.  I play soccer, basketball and lacrosse.  I play the violin.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher. I teach French Immersion in the US.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It's a way that I can help folks around the world, one bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a musician on Broadway in New York City.

lenders.name: Gale
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate, knowing that we share the belief that empowering individuals to make better lives for themselves is the best hope for ending poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a firm that recruits leaders for mission-driven organizations, mostly nonprofits (e.g., educational institutions, advocacy organizations, providers of social services, and foundations).

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: To share the love of Christ!

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I wish to honor the citizens of San Lucas, El Paraiso, Honduras.

lenders.name: matthieu and may
lenders.loan_because: Great stories; great way of feeling useful while promoting self-sufficiency...love the faces across the globe. It helps us dream that we are just one big family!
lenders.occupational_info: We try to bring a complete system of health to people, not only treating them by giving them meds, but also to give them clues on how to live a healthy lifestyle so that the occurrence of illnesses is greatly reduced.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I have been inspired by the Micro-Credit movement and attended a presentation that Kiva gave in Halifax.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Nova Scotia Community College. As a volunteer I am very involved with aboriginal people with disabilities.

lenders.name: Pranav
lenders.loan_because: So one day my borrowers can lend

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.occupation: Pilates and Yoga teacher, Reiki practioner
lenders.loan_because: I believe that what you put out into the universe will come back to you. Everyone deserves compassion and the right to change their life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I make people move!

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: i think kiva is a great idea and I've really enjoyed travelling the 3rd world this is my chance to give something back that shows respect to the people in the 3rd world who want a better life.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: my son is currently a Peace Corp volunteer, working in Bolivia. He is striving to provide clean water to a tiny village in the Andes.  The teachers I work with gave me the gift of helping KIVA in response to the work my son does. I am thrilled to be a part of this important work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in several classrooms at a rural elementary school, tutoring students, teaching math to kindergartners and to fifth graders, helping out wherever it is needed.

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: I think it\'s an easy, quick way to help people in their day by day work
lenders.occupational_info: geographer of the future

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: People in countries like Canada have so much while others have so little.  I feel honored to be able to offer assistance to these people and help make their lives a little easier.  I especially like loaning to women, since I feel that by empowering women you empower their children and community.  By doing this you help to make multi-generational changes leading to a better future for all.  I find these loan recipients truely inspirational and I wish them all the best as they continue to grow their businesses and look after their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Emergency healthcare provider

lenders.name: Scratchy
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to assist micro business owners especially women in the middle east.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need, and want to help people with their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer programmer: I write programs that create reports for a company in the health field.

lenders.name: Penny and John
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help people in their daily lives. Kiva makes the world a smaller more personal, human place.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am self employed and grateful to have that opportunity. Others overseas have the same aspirations and I hope my modest loans can help them to have the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others that help themselves.  These are hard working people that just need a little help.  I'm glad that my money can make such a big difference when added with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an elementary school teacher that doesn't make a lot but I'm lucky to have what I do so I try to share when I can.

lenders.name: Carmita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out even in a small, simple way-- globally!

lenders.name: Don & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We very much believe that micro-lending dramatically improves the lives of people in poverty.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of making small loans to small businesses and entrepreneurs.  I'm pleased that Kiva is so successful!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference on Kiva.  These are hard working people.  They deserve an opportunity to live their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Loving retirement!  Also, I socialize wonderful puppies training to be service dogs.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.occupational_info: I help start small high schools in high-poverty urban areas across the U.S.  See more at hfli.org

lenders.loan_because: We would like to contribute to a global community and help.
lenders.occupational_info: (Tiffany) My work as a movement artist and filmmaker allows me to work with many different kinds of people. I am currently working on a documentary film about incarcerated women working in a vocational training program.  \r\n(Marty) I am a small businessman and crafts person.  I make functional pottery.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in what KIVA is doing and in the people that are trying to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on figuring out what I am going to do with this next stage of life.  But, I am pursuing consulting, yoga instructor training and remodeling.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Share the wealth
lenders.occupational_info: Criminal defense

lenders.occupational_info:
Retired but still learning and attempting to figure it all out .

It's Give Back Time.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed, therefore we feel it is our duty to help others who have a great vision for themselves and their family, but not the financial resources.  Thank you for giving us this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for 11 years, 10 of them teaching first grade.  I have the wonderful opportunity of teaching children how to read.  My husband is a computer technician at a very small yet very useful computer consulting company.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: of Jesus\' love.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and maintain websites at an advertising/design agency.

lenders.name: SnowQ2006

lenders.loan_because: I have traveled around the world and have met many wonderful hard working people.  Plus, I have borrowed money in the past and it has helped me with my business.

General contracting

lenders.name: Darcy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to better their lives.

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.name: Us

I believe in a first step to helping people, so they may help themselves, it is the best way to foster sustainable and permanent local economy. 
"You cannot build character and courage by taking away man's initiative and independence.  You cannot help men permanently by doing for them what they could and should do fort themselves."
Abraham Lincoln

lenders.name: Ihor
lenders.loan_because: it\'s a great idea

lenders.name: Asha

lenders.name: Michelle

lenders.name: Stefan

lenders.name: Sarah

lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a busy little Greek restaurant.  If you've ever seen the movie   "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" you've opened a window into our lives.  My husband really works hard to build a good life for us, and we have been very lucky.

By the time she grows up, hopefully, she will have already helped hundreds of people. Coming myself from Togo, I know how much  we are in need of such actions. Little changes can make a huge difference. This is why I support  KIVA.org in its effort to \"make this world a better place\".
